>
[Improved Hijack Undead](/Feats.aspx?ID=3651) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun](/Sources.aspx?ID=125) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Clockwork Reanimator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=184)

**Prerequisites**
[Clockwork Reanimator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3645); [Hijack Undead](/Feats.aspx?ID=3647)

</column>

---

Undead creatures find it all but impossible to resist your commands. When you use Hijack Undead, if the undead fails its save, it becomes your [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=109) for 10 minutes. If it critically fails, it becomes your minion for 24 hours.
name: Improved Hijack Undead
